You potentially could have heard lots of things.

Some that come to mind ar=
e cats, mice, structural shifts, weather, birds outside, heating or cooling=
 fans, curious insects, a night watchman, sump or plumbing systems ... the =
possibilities are endless.

      I am curious if a=
nyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP in r=
eal time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near =
Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the three=
 halls of the building. The video for all=A0was being monitored and recorde=
d=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera =
sites conected to the central location. I wonder what we might have heard i=
f we did?

=A0
Zack
